description.value:
Class Skills: An oracle with the juju mystery adds Bluff, Intimidate, Knowledge (nature), Perform (oratory), and Survival to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{Speak with Animals} (2nd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{Hideous Laughter} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{Fear} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{Charm Monster} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{Suggestion, Mass} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{Contact Other Plane} (as a 6th-level spell) (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{Summon Nature's Ally VII} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q2r6jrgsbwjgssdg]{Charm Monster, Mass} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange} (18th).
